divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a hovering triangle that appeared to be an aircraft but did not resemble a commercial airplane. It was hovering 100 feet above a house while we drove by, it emitted a beam of light from the "engine" and had red and blue lights on the "wings." When we pulled onto a side street to photograph it, it had vanished.
trends: There have been no other sightings in South Orange
This sighting has never been favorited.
